p: Daily soil moisture conditions across the state were reconstructed over the historical period of 1959–2010. First, the National Cooperative Soil Survey [ 36] was used to identify 1–3 soils representative (and with the necessary texture data reported) of agricultural fields within a few kilometers of each weather station. The daily weather time series were run through STM 2 with each of their associated soils (n = 97) to reconstruct daily soil moisture conditions at each location.
